info: Rating, 5 stars,  · November 2023,  · Stayed a few nights
rating_comment:
Salwa (and her mom) went above and beyond. We became part of the family on our arrival day. Salwa took time to show us some places. The apartment does come with the cozyness of a Bangladeshi home. However, we were always given privacy when we wanted it.
Within 5 days, we really became friends, hung out, had lot's (and I mean lot's) of delicious tea. Highly recommended. Best wishes to Salwa and her mom.
